::Repressor/Zardus::

Repressor sighs, listening to the two as the shuttle flies into the 
docking bay of the Iron Fist.

"We're here," he says to Zardus over the comm, where do you want us 
to go?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus smiles as he recieves Magmatron's transmission, activating his 
comm for a reply.

"Your offer is very acceptable," 'Lord' Zardus replies to 'Emperor' 
Magmatron, "Very acceptable indeed. I welcome this new alliance, 
Empereror Magmatron. You may send Cerebrus, I will tell the defences 
to let him through."

He sets off toward the Iron Fist, switching his comm-link to 
Repressor's frequency.

"Take her to Conference Room A, I shall be there shortly."

The Alliance leader enters the Iron Fist, walking off toward the 
conference room.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Repressor stands up, the shuttle's hatch opening. The docking bay 
closes, leaving the artificial light to fill the area.

"Let's go," he says, "Zardus wants us in Conference Room A."
